email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the vessel's specs and any demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the rate down to $48.50 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is in excellent condition, built in 2018, and fully compliant with all regulations. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.50 sounds better. We can agree to that rate. Can we finalize the laycan as 15-20 October and confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the full vessel details for our records. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. Demurrage is $25,000 per day, pro-rata. I'll send over the full vessel details shortly. Let's proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We'll proceed with the fixture. Please send over the contract for review. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I've attached the contract for your review. Let me know if you need any changes. Looking forward to a successful shipment. Best regards, Sarah
